page.title: 03LOCAL HOUSING
page.content: THE LOCAL AREA OF WHADDON AND LYNWORTH IS MOSTLY{HOUSING.}MOST OF THE BUILDINGS ARE HOUSES, WITH SOME FLATS AND A FEW BUNGALOWS. THERE ARE THREE SMALL{FACTORIES}IN THE AREA AND SOME PEOPLE WORK THERE OR AT THE NEARBY {G.C.H.Q.}OTHER PEOPLE HAVE TO WORK IN TOWN THOUGH THERE ARE A NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO ARE{UNEMPLOYED.}WE DID A TRAFFIC SURVEY OF THE TWO MAIN ROADS IN THE AREA. BOUNCERS LANE HAS A {THROUGH TRAFFIC}SIGN WHICH MAKES MORE VEHICLES PASS ALONG IT THAN ALONG THE PRESTBURY ROAD WHICH LEADS INTO TOWN. WHADDON, LYNWORTH AND PRESTBURY HAVE THEIR OWN{PRIMARY SCHOOLS}BUT WHEN THE CHILDREN REACH THE AGE OF ELEVEN THEY HAVE TO{TRAVEL}ACROSS TOWN TO GET{TO A {SECONDARY SCHOOL.
